original_text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same, and made them other five talents.
korean_text: 다섯 달란트 받은 자는 바로 가서 그것으로 장사하여 또 다섯 달란트를 남기고

sentences.original_text: Then he that had received the five talents
went and traded with the same
and made them other five talents
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것으로 다섯 달란트를 더 만들었다
